recipes.name: Pizza! Pizza! Egg Mug
ingredients: 1 wedge The Laughing Cow Light Creamy Swiss cheese
steps: In a small bowl, combine crushed tomatoes with Italian seasoning. Mix well and set aside.
Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add egg substitute and cheese wedge, breaking the cheese wedge into pieces as you add it. Microwave for 1 minute.
Gently stir. Microwave for another 30 seconds.
Add seasoned tomatoes and pepperoni to the mug. Mix well. Microwave for 30 seconds, or until scramble is set.
Lightly stir. Sprinkle with grated topping. Allow to cool slightly, and then ENJOY!
notes: You'll Need: small bowl, large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes
Tomato Tip! Use leftover crushed tomatoes in a BUNCH of ways -- just look 'em up in the index to see all the crushed-tomatoes-required dishes we've got!
Now, thanks to this recipe, you can embrace those crazy morning pizza cravings...
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 134 calories, 3.25g fat, 746mg sodium, 5g carbs, 3g sugars, 17.5g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: BTA (Bacon, Tomato, Avocado) Egg Mug
ingredients: 1/3 cup chopped tomatoes, patted to remove excess moisture
1 ounce diced avocado (about 1/4 of an avocado)
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add egg substitute and microwave for 1 minute
Gently stir. Add bacon and tomatoes. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set.
If you like, season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with avocado and salsa. Now dig in!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes

This protein packed mug o' hot breakfastness is AMAZING!
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 175 calories, 7.25g fat, 813mg sodium, 8.5g carbs, 3g fiber, 3.5g sugars, 19.5g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: Buffalo Chicken Egg Mug
ingredients: 2 ounces cooked and chopped skinless lean chicken breast
1/2 tablespoon Frank's RedHot Original Cayenne Pepper Sauce
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add egg substitute and onion and microwafe for 1 and 1/2 minutes.
Gently stir in chicken. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set.
Allow to cool slightly. Top with hot sauce, blue cheese dressing, and Parm-style topping. Grab a spoon and eat up!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes
HG Alternative! don't like blue cheese dressing? Swap it out for light ranch.
If you love chicken wings, you'll FREAK over this creative bar-food-inspired breakfast.
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 180 calories, 2.25g fat, 801mg sodium, 6g carbs, 0g fiber, 2g sugars, 33g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: California Love Mug
ingredients: 1 wedge The Laughing Cow Light Creamy Swiss cheese
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add spinach and mushrooms. Microwave for 1 to 2 minutes, until veggies have softened.
Blot any excess moisture from the veggies. Add egg substitute, tomatoes, and cheese wedge, breaking the cheese wedge into pieces as you add it. Mix well, and then microwave for 1 minute.
Gently stir, and then microwave for 1 more minute, or until scramble is just set.
Lightly stir and allow to cool slightly. Top with avocado and enjoy!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes
Are you an egg-mug newbie? Visit page 21 for a fun little intro!
This morning mug is unique and fabulous. Much like yourself... only, um, you're not creamy and infused with avocado.
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 140 calories, 4.5g fat, 456mg sodium, 7g carbs, 2g fiber, 3g sugars, 16g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: Crunchy Beefy Taco Egg Mug
ingredients: 4 low-fat baked tortilla chips, roughly crushed
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add frozen crumbles and microwave for 45 seconds, or until thawed.
Add taco seasoning and mix well. Add egg substitute, stir, and microwave for 1 and 1/2 minutes.
Gently stir and then sprinkle with cheese. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set. Top with tortilla chips, salsa, and sour cream!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes
For a pic of this recipe, see the first photo insert. Yay!
Is it CRAZY to try to stuff a taco into an egg mug? Uhhh... NO WAY. It's BRILLIANT!
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 168 calories, 0.75g fat, 749mg sodium, 12.5g carbs, 1.75g fiber, 3g sugars, 26.5g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
steps: Place bread on a plate or other clean surface.
Apply the peanut butter to one of the pieces of bread.
Apply the jelly to the other piece of bread.
Put the pieces of bread together so that the jelly and the peanut butter are touching.
Eat.

recipes.name: It's All Greek to Me Egg Mug
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add spinach and onion, and microwave for 1 to 2 minutes, until softened.
Blot any excess liquid from veggies. Add egg substitute and mix well. Microwave for 1 minute.
Stir gently. Add all other ingredients and lightly stir. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set.
Gently stir, and then allow to cool slightly. Dig in!
notes: You'll need: lage microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes
Leftover feta alert! Have extra? Flip to the index, locate the cheese listing and make something else that contains fabulous feta. Woohoo!
For a pic of this recipe, see the first photo insert. Yay!
Never been to Greece? don't know how to pronounce spanakopita? Worry not -- you'll STILL love this feta-infused egg mug!
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 117 calories, 2g fat, 459mg sodium, 8g carbs, 1g fiber, 3g sugars, 16g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: Chicken Fajita Scramble Mug
ingredients: 1 ounce cooked and chopped skinless lean chicken breast
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add veggies, chicken, and fajita seasoning. Stir well to distribute seasoning. Microwave for 1 to 2 minutes, until veggies have softened.
Add egg substitute and mix well. Microwave for 1 minute.
Add cheese and genly stir. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set.
Allow to cool slightly. Top with sour cream and enjoy!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes

Peppers? CHECK! Onions? CHECK! Chicken? YUP! All your favorite fajita flavors in one li'l eggy mug.
PER SERVING (entire recipe): 163 calories, 0.75g fat, 583mg sodium, 12g carbs, 1.25g fiber, 5.5g sugars, 26g protein
Makes 1 serving

recipes.name: Denver Omelette in a Mug
ingredients: 1 ounce (about 2 slices) 97% to 98% fat-free ham, chopped
steps: Spray a large microwave-safe mug with nonstick spray. Add veggies and microwave for 1 to 2 minutes, until softened.
Blot any excess liquid from veggies. Add egg subsitute, mix well, and microwave for 1 minute.
Add ham and cheese and lightly stir. Microwave for 1 minute, or until scramble is just set.
Let cool slightly, and then eat up!
notes: You'll need: large microwave-safe mug, nonstick spray
Prep: 5 minutes
Cook: 5 minutes

You don't need to go to a diner for this one, people. Here's a new HG classic!
